value.name: Lafayette Police officers who fatally shot Trayford Pellerin won't face charges
value.description: The Lafayette Police Department officers who fatally shot a Black man outside a gas station will not face charges.

value.name: Lafayette Police Officers Won’t Be Indicted in Trayford Pellerin Death
value.description: A Lafayette Parish grand jury today has decided not to indict any of the Lafayette Police officers involved in the shooting death of Trayford Pellerin on August 21, 2020.

value.name: Lafayette Grand Jury: No indictments in Trayford Pellerin case
value.description: LAFAYETTE, La. — A Lafayette Parish grand jury declined to indict anyone Tuesday in the 2020 killing of Trayford Pellerin. This means that no one will be prosecuted in the case, Lafayette ...

value.name: No indictment against Lafayette Police officers in shooting death of Trayford Pellerin

value.name: Trayford Pellerin's family, attorney frustrated by lack of charges will turn to civil action for justice

value.name: Lafayette Parish grand jury declines to indict police officers in Trayford Pellerin killing

value.name: 'It is criminal': Activists, lawyers demand charges against Louisiana troopers in Ronald Greene's 2019 death
value.description: Louisiana State Police did not open an administrative investigation into the troopers’ use of force until 474 days after Ronald Greene’s death.

value.name: After video of Pellerin’s death is released, calls for greater transparency renew
value.description: Pellerin’s family and local activists want Lafayette to adopt a proactive policy for releasing body-worn camera footage.

value.name: Activist Reacts to Judicial District Attorney Don Landry Announcing the Decision To Not Return Indictments Against Lafayette Police Officers
value.description: Activist group Village 337 that has been working around the community for the past 8 months since the death of Trayford Pellerin is not satisfied with the decision that was made.
